RuleSet.Name: src/Schema/jpa/SchemaJpaTable.java
RuleSet.Descr: Java JPA implementation of a $TableName$ entity.

GenFile.Name: fileSchemaJpaTableJava
GenFile.BasePackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$/src/main/java
GenFile.SubPackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$.jpa

RuleSet.GenRule: $switch HasSuperClassRelation no implJpaOptAuditColumnAttr default empty$$iterate Columns( each maybeDeclSchemaJpaTableJPADataColumn )$

set$reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( lone implColumnAttrOptionality first empty each empty empty empty )$$reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( lone Name first empty each emptyl empty empty )$($leadlower reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( lone implColumnAttrOptionality first empty each empty empty empty )$$reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( lone Name first empty each empty empty empty )$);
@Index(name = "$IndexName$", columnList = "$jpaTableIndexColumnList$", unique = $switch IsUnique yes true default false$)
$iterate Columns( each CommaDbColumnName first DbColumnName empty empty )$
public final static int CLASS_CODE = 0x$ClassCode$; public final static String S_CLASS_CODE = "$ClassCode$";
$switch IsPrimaryIndexKeyAtomic yes implJpaConstructorInitPKeyAttr default implJpaConstructorInitPKey$$iterate Columns( each implConstructorMaybeInitAttr empty empty )$
$leadlower reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( lone implConstructorInitValue each empty empty empty )$
I$SchemaName$$TableName$HPKey rhs = (I$SchemaName$$TableName$HPKey)obj;$reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each implEqualsCmpAttr )$ return( true );
I$SchemaName$$TableName$PKey rhs = (I$SchemaName$$TableName$PKey)obj;$reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each implEqualsCmpAttr )$
$reference BaseClass switch HasAuditColumns yes implJpaEqualsAuditColumns default empty$
throw new CFLibUnsupportedClassException( getClass(), "compareTo", "obj", obj, null );
I$SchemaName$$TableName$H rhs = (I$SchemaName$$TableName$H)obj;$reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each implCompareToAttr )$
$reference BaseClass switch HasAuditColumns yes implJpaCompareAuditColumns default empty$
throw new CFLibUnsupportedClassException( getClass(), "compareTo", "obj", obj, null );
int cmp = super.compareTo( obj ); return( cmp );
$reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each implJpaSetCopyPKeyCol )$
super.set$reference SuperClassRelation reference ToTable TableName$( src );
""$reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implToStringEmitXmlAttr each empty empty empty )$
